charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across Wally
and Alder battling in the town of windmills.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_030:
Now that I’ve battled a Champion of the
Unova region...
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_040: I can feel our potential rising to new heights!
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_050: Well... Technically I’m a retired Champion.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_060:
That aside, do tell me... Why do you go to such
lengths to become stronger?
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_080: You want to know...why I go to such lengths?
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_090:
Well... When I was weak, my Pokémon lent me
their strength...
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_100:
So I think trying to be stronger is my way of
thanking them for that.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_120:
You should think through your worries and continue
moving forward on the path you’ve chosen.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_130: Continue to grow stronger, alongside your friends.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_140: I will! Thank you so much!
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_0301_150: Looks like you had a great battle.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_0401_160: Yes! I got a lot out of the experience!
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_0302_170: Looks like you got some good advice.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_0402_180: Yes! I feel like I learned something very important!
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_190:
That battle against Alder was a great experience
for me and Gardevoir!
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_210:
I carefully raised Gardevoir knowing that I wanted
to fight alongside him one day.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_220:
In a way, Gardevoir’s presence has helped me
get back to my roots...
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_230:
My other Pokémon helped train him, so he learned
all our best attributes.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_240: Gardevoir is our cute little rookie!
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_250:
I added Gardevoir to my team to rekindle our
goals and ambitions of becoming stronger!
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_260:
I think Gardevoir picked up on that and worked
hard to meet our expectations of him.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_270:
I get a bit nostalgic now, seeing how strong
Gardevoir has become.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_280:
Maybe it’s because I raised Gardevoir from a
Ralts, just like I did with my Gallade.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_290:
I’ve experienced so many things since then, I feel
like I’ve become stronger little by little.
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_300:
The time I spend with my Pokémon is always fresh
and full of surprises!
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_310:
Gardevoir and I made so many memories and built
up a lot of strength together...
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_320:
I want to put it to the test even more than we
already have!
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_0302_350: Wanna team up and battle someone?
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_0402_360:
Yes! I want to battle all sorts of people and
improve my skills!
charaepi_ch0128_10_mitsuru/2301_1201_380:
Rather than try alone...let’s become stronger
alongside one another, just like Alder said!
